alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:07PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Converse County through 245 PM MDT... At 206 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glenrock, or 18 miles east of Casper, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenrock, Rolling Hills, Rolling Hills Estates, Deer Creek and Boxelder. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 149 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
